name: Sorcerpurr
description:
Created for VGDC's 12-Hour Game Jam, Luigi's Jamsion. The theme was Don't Go Outside!

When the wizard's away, the experiments will play!

Play as a wizard's loyal cat and keep rogue experiments from escaping and wreaking havoc in the outside world.

WASD to control the cat

LMB to attack

SPACE to clear the screen of enemies
